S

setCenterPanel() - Method in class Jumble.JumbleGUI
Description: This method will set the center part of the GUI a label for the scrambled word, the combo-boxes with each letter from the word, and the solution for the scrambled word.
setFileMenu() - Method in class Jumble.JumbleGUI
Description: This method will create the File Menu for the user to select the dictionary file if it is not already loaded.
setNorthPanel() - Method in class Jumble.JumbleGUI
Description: This method will set the northern part of the GUI and display the dictionary name + the number of solution for the scrambled word.
setSouthPanel() - Method in class Jumble.JumbleGUI
Description: This method will set the southern part of the GUI and display 3 buttons, the getJumble button, testAnswer button, and the see answer button, which will respectively get the jumble, check to see if the answer is right and display the correct answer if the player is stuck.
